mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SECESSION FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SECESSION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SECESSION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SECESSION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GRADE FROM MEMBER ORDER BY MEMBER_GRADE

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SECESSION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id} AND MEMBER_NAME = #{member_name} AND MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}

SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_PASSWORD, MEMBER_GRADE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_GENDER, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_SECESSION FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{member_id} || '%'

select count(*) as count,TO_CHAR(MEMBER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate from member where member_gender = 'M' group by TO_CHAR(MEMBER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by TO_CHAR(MEMBER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')

select count(*) as count,TO_CHAR(MEMBER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate from member where member_gender = 'F' group by TO_CHAR(MEMBER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') order by TO_CHAR(MEMBER_REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')
